title: Relates to additional credit to volunteer firefighters and volunteer ambulance workers in competitive examinations
summary: Grants additional credit of five points to volunteer firefighters and volunteer ambulance workers in competitive examinations for original appointment or promotion to a civil service position with the state or local government.

       AN  ACT  to  amend  the civil service law, in relation to granting addi-
         tional credit to volunteer firefighters and volunteer ambulance  work-
         ers  in  competitive  examinations  and  authorizing  a  preference in
         retention upon the abolition of certain positions

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section  1.  The  civil service law is amended by adding a new section
    2  85-d to read as follows:
    3    S 85-D.  ADDITIONAL CREDIT ALLOWED VOLUNTEER FIREFIGHTERS  AND  VOLUN-
    4  TEER  AMBULANCE  WORKERS  IN  COMPETITIVE  EXAMINATIONS;  PREFERENCE  IN
    5  RETENTION UPON ABOLITION OF POSITIONS. 1. DEFINITIONS.  AS USED IN  THIS
    6  SECTION:
    7    (A)  THE  TERM  "VOLUNTEER FIREFIGHTER" SHALL HAVE THE SAME MEANING AS
    8  ASCRIBED TO SUCH TERM IN SECTION THREE OF  THE  VOLUNTEER  FIREFIGHTERS'
    9  BENEFIT LAW.
   10    (B)  THE TERM "VOLUNTEER AMBULANCE WORKER" SHALL HAVE THE SAME MEANING
   11  AS ASCRIBED TO SUCH TERM IN SECTION THREE  OF  THE  VOLUNTEER  AMBULANCE
   12  WORKERS' BENEFIT LAW.
   13    2.    ADDITIONAL  CREDITS  IN  COMPETITIVE  EXAMINATIONS  FOR ORIGINAL
   14  APPOINTMENT OR PROMOTION.  (A)   ON ALL ELIGIBLE  LISTS  RESULTING  FROM
   15  COMPETITIVE EXAMINATIONS, THE NAMES OF ELIGIBLES SHALL BE ENTERED IN THE
   16  ORDER  OF THEIR RESPECTIVE FINAL EARNED RATINGS ON EXAMINATION, WITH THE
   17  NAME OF THE ELIGIBLE WITH THE HIGHEST FINAL EARNED RATING AT THE HEAD OF
   18  SUCH LIST, PROVIDED, HOWEVER, THAT FOR THE PURPOSE OF DETERMINING  FINAL
   19  EARNED  RATINGS,  VOLUNTEER FIREFIGHTERS AND VOLUNTEER AMBULANCE WORKERS

        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD01298-01-1

       A. 688                              2

    1  SHALL BE ENTITLED TO RECEIVE IN A COMPETITIVE EXAMINATION  FOR  ORIGINAL
    2  APPOINTMENT AN ADDITIONAL FIVE POINTS.
    3    (B)   SUCH ADDITIONAL CREDIT SHALL BE ADDED TO THE FINAL EARNED RATING
    4  OF SUCH VOLUNTEER FIREFIGHTER OR VOLUNTEER AMBULANCE WORKER AFTER HE  OR
    5  SHE  HAS  QUALIFIED  IN THE COMPETITIVE EXAMINATION AND SHALL BE GRANTED
    6  ONLY AT THE TIME OF ESTABLISHMENT OF THE RESULTING ELIGIBLE LIST.
    7    3.  APPLICATION FOR ADDITIONAL CREDIT; PROOF  OF  ELIGIBILITY;  ESTAB-
    8  LISHMENT  OF ELIGIBLE LIST.  ANY CANDIDATE, BELIEVING HIMSELF OR HERSELF
    9  ENTITLED TO ADDITIONAL CREDIT IN A COMPETITIVE EXAMINATION  AS  PROVIDED
   10  HEREIN,  MAY  MAKE  APPLICATION  FOR  SUCH ADDITIONAL CREDIT AT ANY TIME
   11  BETWEEN THE DATE OF HIS OR HER APPLICATION FOR EXAMINATION AND THE  DATE
   12  OF  THE  ESTABLISHMENT  OF THE RESULTING ELIGIBLE LIST.  SUCH CANDIDATES
   13  SHALL BE ALLOWED A PERIOD OF NOT LESS THAN TWO MONTHS FROM THE  DATE  OF
   14  THE  FILING OF HIS OR HER APPLICATION FOR EXAMINATION IN WHICH TO ESTAB-
   15  LISH BY APPROPRIATE DOCUMENTARY PROOF HIS OR HER ELIGIBILITY TO  RECEIVE
   16  ADDITIONAL CREDIT UNDER THIS SECTION.  AT ANY TIME AFTER TWO MONTHS HAVE
   17  ELAPSED  SINCE  THE FINAL DATE FOR FILING APPLICATIONS FOR A COMPETITIVE
   18  EXAMINATION FOR ORIGINAL APPOINTMENT OR  PROMOTION,  THE  ELIGIBLE  LIST
   19  RESULTING  FROM SUCH EXAMINATION MAY BE ESTABLISHED, NOTWITHSTANDING THE
   20  FACT THAT A VOLUNTEER FIREFIGHTER OR A VOLUNTEER  AMBULANCE  WORKER  WHO
   21  HAS  APPLIED  FOR  ADDITIONAL  CREDIT HAS FAILED TO ESTABLISH HIS OR HER
   22  ELIGIBILITY TO RECEIVE SUCH ADDITIONAL CREDIT.  A CANDIDATE MUST  BE  IN
   23  GOOD  STANDING  AND  SUCH  EVIDENCE  MUST  BE CERTIFIED AND SUBMITTED AS
   24  SUPPORTING DOCUMENTATION TO THE DEPARTMENT.   A CANDIDATE WHO  FAILS  TO
   25  ESTABLISH,  BY  APPROPRIATE DOCUMENTARY PROOF, HIS OR HER ELIGIBILITY TO
   26  RECEIVE ADDITIONAL CREDIT BY THE TIME AN ELIGIBLE  LIST  IS  ESTABLISHED
   27  SHALL NOT THEREAFTER BE GRANTED ADDITIONAL CREDIT ON SUCH ELIGIBLE LIST.
   28    4.    USE  OF ADDITIONAL CREDIT.  (A)  EXCEPT AS OTHERWISE PROVIDED IN
   29  THIS SECTION, NO PERSON WHO HAS RECEIVED A PERMANENT  ORIGINAL  APPOINT-
   30  MENT  OR  A  PERMANENT PROMOTION IN THE CIVIL SERVICE OF THE STATE OR OF
   31  ANY CITY OR CIVIL DIVISION THEREOF FROM AN ELIGIBLE LIST ON WHICH HE  OR
   32  SHE  WAS  ALLOWED  THE  ADDITIONAL  CREDIT GRANTED BY THIS SECTION  AS A
   33  VOLUNTEER FIREFIGHTER OR A VOLUNTEER AMBULANCE WORKER  SHALL  THEREAFTER
   34  BE  ENTITLED  TO ANY ADDITIONAL CREDIT UNDER THIS SECTION AS A VOLUNTEER
   35  FIREFIGHTER OR A VOLUNTEER AMBULANCE WORKER.
   36    (B)  WHERE, AT THE TIME OF ESTABLISHMENT  OF  AN  ELIGIBLE  LIST,  THE
   37  POSITION  OF  A VOLUNTEER FIREFIGHTER OR A VOLUNTEER AMBULANCE WORKER ON
   38  SUCH LIST HAS NOT BEEN AFFECTED BY THE ADDITION OF CREDITS GRANTED UNDER
   39  THIS SECTION, THE APPOINTMENT OR PROMOTION OF SUCH VOLUNTEER FIREFIGHTER
   40  OR SUCH VOLUNTEER AMBULANCE WORKER FROM SUCH ELIGIBLE LIST SHALL NOT  BE
   41  DEEMED  TO  HAVE  BEEN MADE FROM AN ELIGIBLE LIST ON WHICH HE OR SHE WAS
   42  ALLOWED THE ADDITIONAL CREDIT GRANTED BY THIS SECTION.
   43    (C)  IF, AT THE TIME OF APPOINTMENT FROM AN ELIGIBLE LIST, A VOLUNTEER
   44  FIREFIGHTER OR A VOLUNTEER AMBULANCE WORKER  IS  IN  THE  SAME  RELATIVE
   45  STANDING AMONG THE ELIGIBLES WHO ARE WILLING TO ACCEPT APPOINTMENT AS IF
   46  HE  OR  SHE HAD NOT BEEN GRANTED THE ADDITIONAL CREDITS PROVIDED BY THIS
   47  SECTION, HIS OR HER APPOINTMENT FROM AMONG SUCH ELIGIBLES SHALL  NOT  BE
   48  DEEMED  TO  HAVE  BEEN MADE FROM AN ELIGIBLE LIST ON WHICH HE OR SHE WAS
   49  ALLOWED SUCH ADDITIONAL CREDITS.
   50    (D)  WHERE A VOLUNTEER FIREFIGHTER OR A VOLUNTEER AMBULANCE WORKER HAS
   51  BEEN ORIGINALLY APPOINTED OR PROMOTED FROM AN ELIGIBLE LIST ON WHICH  HE
   52  OR  SHE WAS ALLOWED ADDITIONAL CREDIT, BUT SUCH APPOINTMENT OR PROMOTION
   53  IS THEREAFTER TERMINATED EITHER AT THE END OF THE PROBATIONARY  TERM  OR
   54  BY  RESIGNATION AT OR BEFORE THE END OF THE PROBATIONARY TERM, HE OR SHE
   55  SHALL NOT BE DEEMED TO HAVE BEEN APPOINTED OR PROMOTED, AS THE CASE  MAY
   56  BE,  FROM  AN  ELIGIBLE  LIST  ON WHICH HE OR SHE WAS ALLOWED ADDITIONAL

       A. 688                              3

    1  CREDIT, AND SUCH APPOINTMENT OR PROMOTION SHALL NOT AFFECT  HIS  OR  HER
    2  ELIGIBILITY FOR ADDITIONAL CREDIT IN OTHER EXAMINATIONS.
    3    5.  WITHDRAWAL OF APPLICATION; ELECTION TO RELINQUISH ADDITIONAL CRED-
    4  IT.    AN APPLICATION FOR ADDITIONAL CREDIT IN A COMPETITIVE EXAMINATION
    5  UNDER THIS SECTION MAY BE WITHDRAWN BY THE APPLICANT AT ANY  TIME  PRIOR
    6  TO THE ESTABLISHMENT OF THE RESULTING ELIGIBLE LIST.  AT ANY TIME DURING
    7  THE  TERM  OF EXISTENCE OF AN ELIGIBLE LIST RESULTING FROM A COMPETITIVE
    8  EXAMINATION IN WHICH A VOLUNTEER FIREFIGHTER OR  A  VOLUNTEER  AMBULANCE
    9  WORKER  HAS RECEIVED THE ADDITIONAL CREDIT GRANTED BY THIS SECTION, SUCH
   10  VOLUNTEER FIREFIGHTER OR VOLUNTEER AMBULANCE WORKER MAY ELECT, PRIOR  TO
   11  PERMANENT ORIGINAL APPOINTMENT OR PERMANENT PROMOTION, TO RELINQUISH THE
   12  ADDITIONAL CREDIT THERETOFORE GRANTED TO HIM OR HER AND ACCEPT THE LOWER
   13  POSITION  ON  SUCH ELIGIBLE LIST TO WHICH HE OR SHE WOULD OTHERWISE HAVE
   14  BEEN ENTITLED; PROVIDED, HOWEVER, THAT SUCH ELECTION SHALL THEREAFTER BE
   15  IRREVOCABLE.  SUCH ELECTION SHALL BE IN WRITING AND SIGNED BY THE VOLUN-
   16  TEER FIREFIGHTER OR THE VOLUNTEER AMBULANCE WORKER, AND  TRANSMITTED  TO
   17  THE DEPARTMENT OR THE APPROPRIATE MUNICIPAL CIVIL SERVICE COMMISSION.
   18    6.  ROSTER.  THE DEPARTMENT AND EACH MUNICIPAL COMMISSION SHALL ESTAB-
   19  LISH  AND  MAINTAIN IN ITS OFFICE A ROSTER OF ALL VOLUNTEER FIREFIGHTERS
   20  AND VOLUNTEER AMBULANCE WORKERS APPOINTED OR PROMOTED  AS  A  RESULT  OF
   21  ADDITIONAL CREDITS GRANTED BY THIS SECTION TO POSITIONS UNDER ITS JURIS-
   22  DICTION.    THE APPOINTMENT OR PROMOTION OF A VOLUNTEER FIREFIGHTER OR A
   23  VOLUNTEER AMBULANCE WORKER AS A RESULT OF ADDITIONAL  CREDITS  SHALL  BE
   24  VOID  IF SUCH VOLUNTEER FIREFIGHTER OR VOLUNTEER AMBULANCE WORKER, PRIOR
   25  TO SUCH APPOINTMENT OR PROMOTION, HAD BEEN APPOINTED OR  PROMOTED  AS  A
   26  RESULT OF ADDITIONAL CREDITS GRANTED BY THIS SECTION.
   27    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law, in relation to granting additional credit to volunteer firefighters and volunteer ambulance workers in competitive examinations and authorizing a preference in retention upon the abolition of certain positions
